SCI Space: AI-driven platform for exploring, understanding, and publishing research papers, Comprehensive searchable database of over 270 million papers, authors, topics, journals, and conferences, Plagiarism checker, Journal submission, XML converters, AI copilot to decode any research paper, Personalized recommendations of popular papers, topics, and conferences, Gallery of over 40,000 journal templates
Explain Paper: AI-powered research paper tool, Upload a paper and highlight confusing text, Get an explanation of the highlighted text, Simplifies and explains complex concepts, Offers AI explanations for dense sections, Provides a user-friendly interface
Tavily AI: Searches internet for user queries, summarizes relevant information, avoids hallucinated answers, useful for market insights.
Consensus: AI-powered search engine for scientific research, Aggregates findings directly from scientific studies, Provides evidence-based answers faster, perfect to find relevant papers, Offers a user-friendly interface
Elicit: AI-powered research tool for academic research, ITS NOT A MIND-MAP TOOL, Textual data analysis, Key themes, sentiments, and patterns identification, Summarization and visualization, Research question generation and can find relevant papers without needing exact keyword matches and extract key information from them.
Julius AI: Analysis of structured data from spreadsheets, Excel files, and CSV files., Data visualization, including the generation of visual charts and dynamic visualizations., Question-driven analysis, allowing users to ask data-related questions and receive instant answers., Statistical modeling capabilities for expert-level insights., Versatile data connectivity, enabling the tool to connect to various data sources such as Excel Sheets, Google Sheets.
Einblick: Data visualization, including the generation of visually appealing charts and graphs., Support for various file formats, such as Excel, JSON, and Google Sheets., Seamless integration with data storage methods, eliminating the need for extensive pre-processing., User-friendly interface, making it accessible to users without advanced data analytics skills.
Heuristica: AI-powered mind-map tool that helps users organize their thoughts and ideas visually., Simplifies the process of visually learning, researching, and creating concept mind-maps, making it easier for users to understand and develop their ideas., User-friendly interface that saves time and effort, allowing users to focus on the content itself.
Monkeylearn: Text analysis platform that allows businesses to automatically analyze their data using machine learning, main feature is that the tool Can create beautiful word clouds for free., Access to powerful text analysis tools that categorize data by sentiment, topic, and more., User-friendly interface that requires no prior coding knowledge., Ability to classify texts with custom categories or tags for sentiment analysis, topic detection, product classification, aspects detection, and much more., Extraction models to extract data from text. There main feature is their free word cloud generator.
Otter.ai: Real-time transcription and note-taking tool that generates rich notes for meetings, interviews, lectures, and other important voice conversations., AI-powered assistant for note-taking, meeting highlights, and transcription., Integration with Zoom, Teams, and Meet., Custom vocabulary, speaker identification, and time codes., Centralized billing and user management., Reporting and analytics., Two-factor authentication and comment folders., Available on iOS, Android, and web.
Fireflies.ai: AI-powered meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and automates meeting note-taking., Integration with various video-conferencing apps, dialers, and audio files., User-friendly interface that requires no prior coding knowledge., Ability to classify texts with custom categories or tags for sentiment analysis, topic detection, product classification, aspects detection, and much more., Extraction models to extract data from text., Integration with Zoom, Teams, and Meet.
Scribe: Automated Documentation: Scribe AI uses generative AI to create company-specific processes tailored to your unique business, automating the most dreaded part of work: documentation, Integration with Web Apps: Scribe AI works with any web app on any browser, making it easy to create and customize guides on any platform, Quick Customization: The tool offers quick and efficient creation of tutorials and guides, with a wide range of customization options for content, Branded Guides: Scribe AI allows users to create branded guides with their company's logo and colors, removing the Scribe branding, Export Formats: Users can export guides to HTML, Confluence, and Markdown formats, Desktop Capture: Scribe AI can capture processes on desktop-based applications, Multiple Workspaces: The tool allows users to manage documents and users across multiple teams, with admins able to review and approve new guides before publishing them to the company's workspace, Review & Approval Queue: Scribe AI offers a review and approval queue for managing the publishing process, Sensitive Data Redaction: The tool can redact sensitive information from screenshots, Smart Embed: Scribe AI allows users to embed their guides and pages into knowledge bases, wikis, and more
ClassPoint AI: AI-powered presentation tool that enhances PowerPoint presentations with interactive questions, gamification, and feedback collection., Customizable templates, drag and drop functionality, and reporting/analytics., Integration with PowerPoint, Q&A, and live results tracking., Blended learning, assessments, and visualization/presentation tools., Content import/export and PowerPoint conversion.
GradeScope: AI-assisted grading that groups similar answers together, eliminating redundancies and enabling higher quality, more consistent feedback., Item-level statistics that give instructors immediate and actionable feedback on student progress., Dynamic rubrics that can be built in advance or created on the fly, allowing for collaborative construction and real-time adjustments., Fast grading and effective feedback that accelerates the grading process, increases feedback consistency, and provides clear insights into student learning trends in real time., Support for various assignment types, including paper-based, bubble sheet, digital, and code assignments., Detailed analytics that help instructors get a clear picture of student performance and address potential learning gaps through department-level metrics., Scoring consistency and workflow management that supports scoring consistency across multiple graders and provides an optional process workflow for item-level regrade request management., Integration with learning management systems such as Canvas to facilitate the grading of paper and digital assignments., Optical character recognition (OCR) and AI assistance that efficiently grades and provides substantive feedback on various assignment types, reducing manual grading time., AI-driven answer grouping that enables instructors to sort student answers into groups and grade whole groups at once, saving time and providing clearer feedback to students.
PowerPoint Speaker Coach: AI-powered tool that helps users refine their presentation skills by providing real-time feedback on pacing, pitch, filler words, informal speech, euphemisms, and culturally sensitive terms., Detects when users are reading from their slides too much or simply reading the text on a slide., Provides a report after each rehearsal with statistics and suggestions for improvements., Compatible with Microsoft Edge version 15 or later, Chrome version 52 or later, and Firefox version 52 or later.
Merlin AI: AI-powered Chrome extension that streamlines browsing experience and enhances productivity., Provides real-time AI-powered assistance for various tasks, such as writing emails, summarizing articles, and answering questions., Offers a user-friendly interface and easy installation., Available in multiple languages., Provides suggestions for improvements after each use., Compatible with multiple web browsers.

SCI Space: Basic (Free): Offers basic features but good enough to get you started, Paid plans for researchers and team are available.
Explain Paper: You can start using Explainpaper for free. Nevertheless, to access all features, you need to upgrade the plan, with its pricing starting at around $12 per month.
Tavily AI: Free tier: Basic features, Solo: $40 dollar per month, offers full API access.
Consensus: Free tier: Basic features but these are more than enough to fulle use the tool., Premium plan: Offers additional features and benefits for 7 dollar a mount
Elicit: Limited free usage but good enough to get you started, you can usethe tool unlimited for 12 dollar per month
Julius AI: Free plan with limitations, including the ability to send up to 15 messages per month., Paid plans are available with a discounts for students and teachers.
Einblick: Completely free to use Chartgen function within Einblick. To use all Einblick capabilities there are premium plans starting from 9 dollar a month
Heuristica: Completely Free to use when making an account. No pricing systems
Monkeylearn: Offers some free tools such as word cloud generators and text analysis. However paid plans are more for entire businesses rather than individual usage.
Otter.ai: Basic: Free. Pro plan cost $17 per month. For business its $30 per month.
Fireflies.ai: Free: Basic features, limited transcription credits. Addiotional paid plan available.
Scribe: Free Plan: This plan allows users to create how-to guides in a few clicks. Also offers a Pro plan priced at $29 per month which offers additional features.
ClassPoint AI: Basic: Free, limited class size and features., Pro: $8 dollar a month or $96 billed annually, unlimited engagement for sessions, up to 200 class size, 500 AI quiz credits, and advanced gamification., School: Custom pricing, includes all features of the Pro plan, with additional tools and personalized support.
GradeScope: Gradescope offers two plans: Gradescope Basic and Gradescope Institutional. After an institutional trial, you can continue using the Basic plan for free
ChatGPT: Free to use however to get the best results you need to have ChatGPT Plus which costs 20 dollar
Bing Chat: Free to use with a Microsoft account
Perplexity AI: Free plan offers more than enough capabilities, Premium plan: $20 dollar a month or $200 dollar a year, includes unlimited copilot usage, GPT-4 access, dedicated support, and updated information
Quillbot: Free plan with basic features, Premium plan cost 15 dollar a month or 80 dollar a year, offering additional features such as unlimited words, more tones, and a plagiarism checker
Grammarly: Free plan: Essentials to start writing with AI assistance, 100 prompts a month, Premium plan: Robust AI features, including generative AI assistance, unlimited prompts, and suggestions for improved communication
